name: Mammut Pro Protection Airbag 3.0 - Unisex
description: Made for guides and other snow pros, these packs combine enormous cargo capacity with a Protective Airbag 3.0 System. The PAS 3.0 doesn’t only reduce the chance of burial, it helps protect against the mechanical trauma that causes many avalanche casualties.PAS 3.0 airbag extends around head, neck, and down the front of shoulder straps for impact protection, neck stabilization, and increased chances of your head being above the snow when a slide stops.U-shaped aluminum frame for efficient load carrying.Adjustable back with 3 length settings.Padded hipbelt with pockets.Large lined top pocket for goggles or electronics.Zippered inner pocket with key loop.Removable snowboard carry straps.Stowable diagonal ski carry, ice axe/pole loops and helmet carrier.Safety leg loop.Front pocket for avalanche equipment.Hydration system ready (not included).Refillable air cartridge is not included. Full cartridges cannot be shipped by mail, but can be purchased at most MEC retail stores.Empty cartridges can be filled at approved centres such as dive shops or paintball stores.
